des: "Orange juice combined with ginger, cloves, and other winter spices make for a great party cocktail. Nondrinkers will enjoy this without the vodka."
ins: Stir together orange juice, vanilla extract, cinnamon, allspice, cloves, nutmeg, and ginger in a saucepan. Bring to a simmer, stirring occasionally, then remove from the heat. Stir in the vodka and serve hot.
